job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Front-End Developer- AI Trainer (Dutch)

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on training AI models by providing human feedback, specifically by crafting questions and evaluating code generated by AI. While it mentions 'generative AI models' and 'large language models', the core tasks described do not involve building, fine-tuning, or deploying these models. Instead, it emphasizes the use of AI tools to enhance productivity and assist in coding tasks, aligning with the definition of the 'Ambiguous' profile, which is for roles primarily focused on the use of AI tools or not directly involved in AI development.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'help train AI models' directly relates to the process of creating or adapting machine learning models, even if it's through human feedback.
Crafting questions to train AI models is a form of data preparation and model interaction aimed at improving model performance.
job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models

job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models is a form of model assessment and feedback loop, crucial for model improvement.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'experienced software engineer' and 'coding expertise', indicating a background in software development, although the primary tasks are focused on training rather than building applications.
The phrase 'helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code' implies an interaction with and improvement of AI-generated code, which is related to software development output.
job_tasks.phrase: helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'engaging with these models as they learn to code', which is an active participation in the development lifecycle of AI-assisted coding.
job_tasks.phrase: engaging with these models as they learn to code

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
